thread_replies.author: yuu
thread_replies.text:
You know what?
Shiki-chan's Nii's time's Ayase Haruka is turning into that.
There's a nostalgic feeling, but no memories. I loved her, but I don't know what I loved. I don't remember the name or the face, but it's that "I held her in high esteem" kind of thing. #ALittleBitEsper
